title: Sitka National Historical Park: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved                   Volunteer               Work With Us               Donate to the park               Long-Range Planning         Â    Looking for how to get involved? Browse through the website navigation or use the search tool to find opportunities.   National Park Service Centennial 2016 is the 100-year anniversary of the National Park Service!  Find out what we and other parks are doing to get ready.    Volunteer  Whether you want to spend several months working with us or just help out with a special event or two, we have lots of great opportunities for volunteers.    Work With Us Learn about job opportunities at Sitka National Historical Park.  Most of our jobs are seasonal, and hiring usually takes place during the winter.       Partners  We couldn't do it alone!  Learn about Alaska Geographic, the Sitka Tribe of Alaska, and other partners who help us make the park great.     Planning The planning process is how the public can express opinions in the management of a national park.  Find out if any current opportunities exist to share your voice, or browse past planning documents.    Donate Find out how to make a financial donation to support the park.
